channel.title: [PI] run cmd glitch rep+++ plz need this
channel.description: heres the glitch when i summon an npc after trying to add summon pouches following a tutorial, i can show u the places where the error is at, but please help or make an suggestion. [code] [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler. java:2641) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler. java:2660) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.Summon(NPCHandler.java:6 9) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.players.skills.Summoning.SummonNewNPC(Su mmoning.java:746) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ItemClick3.summon(ItemCl ick3.java:22) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ItemClick3.processPacket (ItemClick3.java:361) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1918) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:140) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:173) [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: Game saved for player imsuperman05 [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: [DEREGISTERED]: imsuperman05 [7/3/11 1:23 AM]: [REGISTERED]: imsuperman05[/code]

item.title: [PI] run cmd glitch rep+++ plz need this
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Vexillum:

Go over the tutorial and see if you missed anything.

I did, multiple times, i even deleted it fully, and still same thing

[quote=“divinityms, post:3, topic:402088”]I use to have a crash like that when I tryed to add the korasi sword to my server, I found out that my 317 couldn’t handle the 508 models so it would crash.

Your models, perhaps?[/quote]

It’s an Erasedpkz base, and the tutorial was for this base.
Thanks guys for the effort though

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] run cmd glitch rep+++ plz need this
